name: Jamout
description:
What to do with all of those leftover stickies at the end of a brainstorm? Why not play the arcade classic Breakout on your FigJam file.


Inserting this widget will give you a paddle. When you click on it it will spawn a ball that will knock around your document. Each time the ball bumps into a sticky it will delete a stamp and if the sticky is out of stamps the sticky will be deleted.
